summary: This bill, the "Access to Fertility Treatment and Care Act," mandates health insurance coverage for fertility treatments including IVF, medication, and related services. It amends existing laws (PHSA, ERISA, IRC, Title 5, Title 10, Title 38, Social Security Act) to ensure coverage across various healthcare plans (group, individual, federal employee, TRICARE, veterans, Medicaid, and Medicare). It defines fertility treatment, details required coverage, prohibits discriminatory practices, and mandates notice provisions. The bill also specifies cost-sharing limitations and provides effective dates for implementation.
